com.tictactoe.gameelements

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tictactoe.gameelements.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that represents each player playing the game
    Author:
    arjunb

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(boolean isHuman,
              CellMarker playerMarker)
        This is the constructor for a player object
        Parameters:
        isHuman - This is a boolean variable which is true if the player is playing the game through the console
        playerMarker - This denotes whether the player is playing with a CROSS or a NOUGHT

        public boolean isHuman()
        This method returns true if the player object is a human player else returns false
        Returns:
        If human, true, else false

      • makeMove

        public GameBoard makeMove(GameBoard gameBoard,
                          int cellNum)
        This method makes a move on the board for the human player
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - This is the current status of the board
        cellNum - This is the choice of move that the human player has made
        Returns:
        The updated game board after making the move
